title: STEEL BATTALION HEAVY ARMOR
description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) This all-new game revives the fan-favorite Steel Battalion series! Microsoft has joined forces with Capcom and From Software to bring you this groundbreaking collaborative project to the Xbox 360. Manhattan, 2082. In a world where computers and almost all modern technology has been lost, the greatest nations of the world continue to battle for hegemony. The American army lands in New York to begin it's first big offensive of a long ground war. Soldiers fire from the trenches as scorched bunkers belch black smoke. As comrades continually fall to the unrelenting crossfire of bullets, the Vertical Tanks make their laborious advance... Experience the battlefield as never before with Kinect! This is what gamers have been waiting for!

contentRating.label: M (Mature)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Camouflage Pack 1: Chrome Blitzer
childDownloads.description: Camouflage Pack 1: Chrome Blitzer. Includes two camouflage skins for your vertical tank. "Tiger Pattern": Increases destructive force of ammo. Use it to increase your attacking power. "Impact Pattern": Increases turn speed. Use it to increase your agility. Change your camouflage to gain an advantage in battle and defeat the Empire!

childDownloads.title: Camouflage Pack 2: Iron Guardian
childDownloads.description: Camouflage Pack 2: Iron Guardian. Includes two camouflage skins for your vertical tank. "Rock Pattern": Increases armor durability. Use it to increase your defensive guard. "Jaguar Pattern": Increases movement speed. Use it to increase your mobility. Change your camouflage to gain an advantage in battle and defeat the Empire!

childDownloads.title: Camouflage Pack 3: Carbon Assassin
childDownloads.description: Camouflage Pack 3: Carbon Assassin. Includes two camouflage skins for your vertical tank. "Savannah Pattern": Increases ammo velocity. Use it to increase your ability to hit speedy targets. "Storm Pattern": Increases main armament range. Use it to increase your attacking range. Change your camouflage to gain an advantage in battle and defeat the Empire!

childDownloads.title: Gamescom Trailer
childDownloads.description: First person warfare has evolved. Steel Battalion Heavy Armor expertly combines Microsoft’s Kinect with regular Xbox 360 controls to deliver a highly immersive war experience. Set in 2082, the game depicts a world devoid of computers, where superpowers struggle for dominance. In this low-tech era one weapon will determine the course of the war – the Vertical Tank. Players take on the role of VT pilot Powers as the battle to regain the USA from occupation begins. In the claustrophobic confines of the VT, use a combination of Kinect and controller gameplay to operate and pilot the VT, interact with crew members, target and destroy enemies.

childDownloads.title: Launch trailer
childDownloads.description: Power up your Vertical Tank and step into the battle as Steel Battalion: Heavy Armor launches on Xbox Kinect.  Feel the intensity of War, Inside and Out in the launch trailer for the game that immerses you in battle like no other title can!

childDownloads.title: STEEL BATTALION - GameStop Preorder Trailer
childDownloads.description: Watch the Iron Guardian Preorder Trailer to learn more about exciting Preorder bonuses at GameStop.

childDownloads.title: Steel Battalion Amazon Preorder Trailer
childDownloads.description: Watch the Carbon Assassin Preorder Trailer to learn more about exciting Preorder bonuses at Amazon.

childDownloads.title: Steel Battalion BestBuy Preorder Trailer
childDownloads.description: Watch the Chrome Blitzer Preorder Trailer to learn more about exciting Preorder bonuses at Best Buy.

childDownloads.title: Steel Battalion: Heavy Armor - Gosha Preview
childDownloads.description: Steel Battalion: Heavy Armor and Mamoru Oshii, the creator of Ghost in the Shell and Avalon, get together to portray the reality of war in this top class collaboration. How will Oshii interpret war inside and out? Check out the teaser of the shoot in Poland now!

childDownloads.title: Steel Battalion Heavy Armor Control Trailer
childDownloads.description: The latest trailer for the Kinect-exclusive Steel Battalion: Heavy Armor! Contains battle scenes taken directly from the game. On the battlefield, the situation can change at the drop of a hat, and players must make smart decisions and keep a cool head when controlling their VTs. You and your crew must fight for justice, and bring freedom back to America!

childDownloads.title: STEEL BATTALION HEAVY ARMOR DEMO
childDownloads.description: This all-new game revives the fan-favorite Steel Battalion series! Microsoft has joined forces with Capcom and From Software to bring you this groundbreaking collaborative project to the Xbox 360. Manhattan, 2082. In a world where computers and almost all modern technology has been lost, the greatest nations of the world continue to battle for hegemony. The American army lands in New York to begin it's first big offensive of a long ground war. Soldiers fire from the trenches as scorched bunkers belch black smoke. As comrades continually fall to the unrelenting crossfire of bullets, the Vertical Tanks make their laborious advance... Experience the battlefield as never before with Kinect! contentRating.label: M (Mature)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Steel Battalion: Heavy Armor Emblem Pack
childDownloads.description: A pack of emblems that can be affixed to your Vertical Tank. Includes the top user-created emblems as well as many others. Find one that suits your personality.

childDownloads.title: Steel Battalion: Heavy Armor, Gosha Teaser Trailer
childDownloads.description: The first opportunity to take a look at Steel Battalion: Heavy Armor Gosha trailer is finally here!  In the 15 second window you will witness a glimpse of how Oshii, the director of critically acclaimed movie Ghost in the Shell, has portrayed war and battlefield with vertical tanks in action with extraordinary characters including the female pilot, Gosha. Heavyly under fire how will Gosha and her crewmen fare?

childDownloads.title: Steel Battalion: Heavy Armor, Gosha Trailer
childDownloads.description: Trailer from the director of Ghost in the Shell, Mamoru Oshii! Follow Gosha, an attractive female soldier with an attitude problem, as she and her platoon engage the enemy. Filmed on location in Poland.  See what it's like to pilot a massive Vertical Tank into battle with Ms. Trigger Happy!

childDownloads.title: Steel Battalion: Heavy Armor, “How to” trailer
childDownloads.description: Find out more about the unique and immersive controls for Steel Battalion: Heavy Armor for the Kinect(TM) in the 'How To' trailer.  It provides a guide for players new to the dual control system and shows how to get the best out of your crew and your Vertical Tank before you head into battle!

childDownloads.title: Steel Battalion: Heavy Armor Map Pack 1
childDownloads.description: Map Pack 1 for Steel Battalion: Heavy Armor. Includes two new co-op missions. "Fuel Requisition": Secure fuel tanks without triggering a massive explosion. "Mountain Sentinels": Attempt to destroy a large enemy cannon located in the mountains. Each mission has three new items for you to find.

childDownloads.title: Steel Battalion: Heavy Armor Map Pack 2
childDownloads.description: Map Pack 2 for Steel Battalion: Heavy Armor. Includes two new co-op missions. "Ammo Dump Jump": Attempt to destroy the enemy ammo dump. "The Champ-de-Mars": Take out the enemy's searchlight. Each mission has three new items for you to find.

childDownloads.title: Steel Battalion: Heavy Armor multiplayer trailer
childDownloads.description: Take on the United Nations menace as you battle to take back America with your comrades in the Steel Battalion: Heavy Armor mutliplayer trailer.

childDownloads.title: Steel Battalion:Heavy Armor SpringShowCase Trailer
childDownloads.description: Check out the latest trailer for the Xbox Kinect exclusive title, Steel Battalion: Heavy Armor! This trailer shows a pilot's emotions in preparation for battle, and examines the things worth fighting for...our familes, friends, and country. With death lurking around every corner, watch as the soliders head off towards the battlefield to reclaim their right to freedom!

childDownloads.title: Tokyo Game Show Trailer
childDownloads.description: This video adds developer commentary to the trailer previously released at Gamescom.
